\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{ambeth.ioc.monitoring.active}
\label{configuration:AmbethIocMonitoringActive}
\ClearAPI
Allows to monitor all IoC managed beans via JMX. Valid values: "true" or "false". Default is "true".\\
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE - DO NOT EDIT
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\type{de.osthus.ambeth.config.IocConfigurationConstants.MonitorBeansActive}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{ambeth.ioc.monitoring.active}}]
ambeth.ioc.monitoring.active=false
\end{lstlisting}
